overview: The world's top African-American pornographer comes together with a cast of shapely, sexy Nubian beauties in Lexington Steele's Black Panthers #4. Each provocatively dressed dime piece performs an arousing tease segment; in three of these, the brazen bitches dance/strip outdoors in broad daylight ... seducing Lex to unleash his massive meat right in front of suburban homes.
title: Lexington Steele's Black Panthers 4
